***** Newar[edit] *****
**** Etymology[edit] ****
From Classical_Newar 𑐠𑑂𑐰 (thva).
**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * IPA(key): [tʰwɔ]
**** Pronoun[edit] ****
थ्व • (thwa) (Newa Spelling 𑐠𑑂𑐰)
   1. this
          o The Bible Psalms.102.18:
                  थ्‍व खँ लिपाया पुस्‍ताया
                  निंतिं च्‍वयाति,
                  अले आः मबूनिपिन्‍सं नं
                  परमप्रभुयात तःधंकी,
                        thwa khã lipāyā pustāyā
                        niṃtiṃ cwayāti,
                        ale ā: mabūnipinsaṃ naṃ
                        paramaprabhuyāta ta:dhaṃkī,
                        This shall be written for the generation to come: and
                        the people which shall be created shall praise the
                        Lord.
